mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createtime, fromusername, msgid, msgtype, tousername, accountid, usercode, ispush, mediaid, picurl, createuser
mapper.insert: insert into wx_receivetext (SEQ_ID, createtime, fromusername, msgid, msgtype, tousername, accountid, usercode, ispush, mediaid, picurl, createuser, content) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tousername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispush,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB})

SEQ_ID,
createtime,
fromusername,
msgid,
msgtype,
tousername,
accountid,
usercode,
ispush,
mediaid,
picurl,
createuser,
content,

mapper.update:
update wx_receivetext
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromusername = #{fromusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msgtype = #{msgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tousername = #{tousername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ispush = #{ispush,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mediaid = #{mediaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picurl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wx_receivetext set createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromusername = #{fromusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgtype = #{msgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tousername = #{tousername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ispush = #{ispush,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mediaid = #{mediaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picurl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wx_receivetext set createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromusername = #{fromusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msgtype = #{msgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tousername = #{tousername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ispush = #{ispush,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mediaid = #{mediaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picurl = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select.if: select * from WX_RECEIVETEXT where fromusername = #{_parameter} and ispush = 0 order by createtime asc limit 0,1
select TOP 1 * from WX_RECEIVETEXT where fromusername = #{_parameter} and ispush = 0 order by createtime asc

mapper.select: select tt.*, ku.usercode, ku.username from WX_RECEIVETEXT tt LEFT JOIN WX_FANS wxu on wxu.openid = tt.fromusername LEFT JOIN KQDS_USERDOCUMENT ku on ku.usercode = wxu.usercode where 1=1 ORDER BY tt.createtime desc

select
TOP 5
tt.*,p.user_id from wx_receivetext tt left join sys_person p on p.seq_id = tt.createuser where 1=1 and (tt.fromusername = #{openid} or tt.tousername = #{openid})
and tt.createtime < #{createtime}
ORDER BY tt.createtime desc
limit 0,5

select (select count(1) from WX_RECEIVETEXT msg where msg.fromusername = dt.openid and msg.ispush = 0 ) as wdcount, dt.*,u.username,u.phonenumber1,u.phonenumber2 from WX_FANS dt left join KQDS_USERDOCUMENT u on u.openid = dt.openid and u.bindstatus = 0 where 1=1 and dt.carestatus = 0 order by dt.lastmsgtime desc

select (select count(1) from WX_RECEIVETEXT msg where msg.fromusername = dt.openid and msg.ispush = 0 ) as wdcount, dt.*,u.username,u.phonenumber1,u.phonenumber2 from WX_FANS dt left join KQDS_USERDOCUMENT u on u.openid = dt.openid and u.bindstatus = 0 where 1=1 order by dt.lastmsgtime desc

select (select count(1) from WX_RECEIVETEXT msg where msg.fromusername = dt.openid and msg.ispush = 0 ) as wdcount, dt.*,u.username from WX_FANS dt left join KQDS_USERDOCUMENT u on u.openid = dt.openid and u.bindstatus = 0 where 1=1 and dt.openid = #{_parameter}
